abstract: Whether camera lens smudge detection is supported.
overview:
## Discussion

This property returns `true` if the session’s current configuration supports lens smudge detection. When switching cameras or formats, this property may change. When this property changes from `true` to `false`, [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/isCameraLensSmudgeDetectionEnabled] also reverts to `false`. If you opt in for lens smudge detection and then change configurations, you should set [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/isCameraLensSmudgeDetectionEnabled] to `true` again.

# isCameraLensSmudgeDetectionSupported

**Instance Property**

Whether camera lens smudge detection is supported.

## Declaration

```swift
var isCameraLensSmudgeDetectionSupported: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property returns `true` if the session’s current configuration supports lens smudge detection. When switching cameras or formats, this property may change. When this property changes from `true` to `false`, [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/isCameraLensSmudgeDetectionEnabled] also reverts to `false`. If you opt in for lens smudge detection and then change configurations, you should set [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/isCameraLensSmudgeDetectionEnabled] to `true` again.
title: isCameraLensSmudgeDetectionSupported
